item.title: Principales Indicadores Económicos de Chile
item.description: Principales Indicadores Económicos USD UF Cobre USD var ctx = document.getElementById('531').getContext('2d'); var options = { type: 'bar', data: { labels: [ 'L-02-Agosto', 'M-03-Agosto', 'Mx-04-Agosto', 'J-05-Agosto', 'V-06-Agosto', ], datasets: [{ label: 'Bar Chart', data: [760.2, 761.39, 774.54, 775.54, 776.69], backgroundColor: [ 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.2)', 'rgba(153, 102, 255, 0.2)', ], borderColor: [ 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)', 'rgba(153, 102, 255, 1)', ], borderWidth: 1 }] }, options: { maintainAspectRatio: false, scales: { yAxes: [{ ticks: { beginAtZero: true } }] } } }; new Chart(ctx, options); UF var ctx = document.
